stimulusHtml: Assume that  SomeClass  object  obj  has been properly declared and instantiated in a class other than  SomeClass.  Which of the following statements will compile without error?

features.html:
Consider the following partial class definition.

 

public class SomeClass
{
   private int myA;

   // Constructor(s) not shown
   
   public int getA()
   {
      return myA;
   }
}
